name: Crypt
longDesc: Statues stand vigil here, halberds extended and crossed over a sealed sarcophagus bearing the face of someone dead so long the memory of their name has joined them. You've heard all sorts of terrible things about curses that befall those who disturb such graves but... what wealth might lie inside, undiscovered?
shortDesc: You stand in an ancient crypt where someone of importance was buried.

shelves.name: Sarcophagus
shelves.desc: A golden sarcophagus- clearly belonging to someone important- probably holding riches, and probably cursed.

shelves.name: Broken Tomb
shelves.desc: The top of a stone tomb lies broken in half.  Did that happen when the floor crumbled?  Or did someone- or something - break out?

doors.name: Narrow Passage
doors.desc: A narrow passage- tight enough you have to hold your breath to squeeze through- leads off to the distance.
